None.Name: Celestial Blade
None.Description: Every 2 seconds, unit casts a lance of light that deals 105 damage to enemies in a 5m radius around its target, up to 160 in total.

None.Name: High Guard
None.Description: Activate to bind to a friendly building. Cannot attack while bound.

None.Name: Resilient
None.Description: The affected building will become resilient and takes 65% less damage.
